page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION.
page.content: We live in the London Borough of Barking & Dagenham which is in the eastern part of the Greater London Council. The A13 and the A124 (London Road) are the main roads in our area. They carry heavy traffic, being the main roads from London to Tilbury Docks. Barking Station is large and built of glass and concrete. British Rail trains run to Fenchurch Street Station and tube trains to London may be caught here. The station is used by commuters who work in London. Mnay of our parents work there. Of the parents of pupils in 4 of our schools about 40% work in Barking; 11% in Dagenham; 10% in Ilford and 23% in London. Mnay parents are out of work. More parents drive to work than go by bus or train.
